message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $150 by you. Considering its quality and unique features, I am offering it to you today for $120. This is a special deal considering its high value to you.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. To accommodate your needs, I would like to offer the product at $105.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $105 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $85. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm glad you're still interested, Bob. Considering the value you place on this product, I'd like to offer it to you for $95.
I'm getting closer to your offer, but $95 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer the product to you for $93.
I'm getting close to your offer, but $93 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $88 for the product. Can you meet me at that price?
Considering your strong interest in the product, I'm willing to offer it to you for $91.
I'm really interested in the product, but $91 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $87 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
